contacts.title: Chief Information & Technology Officer
contacts.relevance_notes: Chief Information & Technology Officer at Bon Secours Mercy Health (parent company). Master's in Organizational Leadership from Gonzaga. Previously SVP & Chief Digital/Information Officer at Hunterdon Healthcare and VP at Mercy (sister organization). Extensive healthcare IT leadership with Warner Bros, Warner Music Group background. Key executive sponsor for enterprise-wide technology and training initiatives.

contacts.title: Clinical Informatics Chief & Officer
contacts.persona_match: Chief Clinical Informatics Officer - Executive Sponsor
contacts.relevance_notes: Chief Clinical Informatics Officer at Bon Secours Mercy Health. DNP from University of Utah. Previously VP Nursing Informatics, Clinical Technology & Evidence Based Practice. Prior roles at St. Luke's as Director Clinical Informatics. Former Neonatal Nurse Practitioner at Johns Hopkins. Directly owns clinical technology strategy including Dragon Copilot and EHR training initiatives.

contacts.title: Vice President, Information Technology Operations & User Experience
contacts.relevance_notes: Vice President IT Operations & User Experience at Bon Secours Mercy Health. MS from Bowling Green State. Previously VP EMR Operations & Training (2016-2020) - directly led Epic training initiatives. Also served as Epic Project Manager. 20+ years at Mercy Health. Critical contact - prior role specifically focused on EMR training leadership.

contacts.title: Vice President, Information Technology Operations & Service Delivery
contacts.persona_match: VP IT Operations & Service Delivery - Executive Sponsor
contacts.relevance_notes: Vice President IT Operations & Service Delivery since February 2025. MBA from Urbana University. Previously System Strategy Director IT and CIO Program Management. 18+ years at Mercy Health including Corporate IT Director Clinical Solutions. Owns IT service delivery and clinical solutions strategy.

contacts.title: Director, System Nursing Informatics & Evidence Based Practice
contacts.persona_match: Director Nursing Informatics - Clinical Informatics Champion
contacts.relevance_notes: Director System Nursing Informatics & Evidence Based Practice since 2019. Master's from Chamberlain College of Nursing. Previously Clinical Senior Manager and ConnectCare Team Lead at Bon Secours for ASAP and Inpatient Clinical Documentation. Key stakeholder for nursing-focused EHR training and evidence-based practice initiatives.

contacts.title: Executive Director, Information Technology, Business Partners & EPIC System Operations
contacts.persona_match: Executive Director EPIC Operations - Program Manager
contacts.relevance_notes: Executive Director IT Business Partners & EPIC System Operations since 2021. MBA from Western Governors University, Ohio State background. Previously Executive Director I&T Lakes Group and Team Lead Manager for Ambulatory & Revenue Cycle EPIC applications. Directly owns EPIC system operations - critical contact for Epic training initiatives.

contacts.title: Director, Systems Clinical Informatics Ambulatory
contacts.persona_match: Director Clinical Informatics Ambulatory - Clinical Informatics Champion
contacts.relevance_notes: Director Systems Clinical Informatics Ambulatory since 2024. MD from Our Lady of Fatima University, CPC certified. Previously Manager Informatics for Decision Support. Prior experience at Kaiser Permanente as Senior Business Process Analyst. Physician background with informatics expertise - key ambulatory clinical informatics leader.

contacts.title: Solutions Manager, Learning Technology
contacts.persona_match: Learning Technology Manager - IT/Learning Technology Manager
contacts.relevance_notes: Solutions Manager Learning Technology since 2015. Master's from West Virginia University. 10 years in learning technology at Bon Secours Mercy Health. Directly owns learning technology solutions and LMS - primary contact for learning technology integration and virtual training platform discussions.

contacts.title: Program Manager, Learning Experience Design
contacts.relevance_notes: Program Manager Learning Experience Design since 2022. BS from Northern Kentucky University. Previously Program Manager Virtual Coaching & Delivery at BSMH. Prior experience as Manager Virtual Learning & Development at Macy's. Expertise in virtual learning delivery - directly relevant to VILT training initiatives.

contacts.title: Director, Clinical Education
contacts.relevance_notes: Director Clinical Education at Mercy Health. 37+ years tenure. Owns clinical education programs - key stakeholder for clinical training content and delivery. Note: No email available in ZoomInfo.

contacts.title: Supervisor, Electronic Health Record Learning Management System
contacts.persona_match: EHR LMS Supervisor - IT/Learning Technology Manager
contacts.relevance_notes: Supervisor EHR Learning Management System since 2019. MBA, CMPE certified. Previously EPIC Certified AC Trainer and Practice Manager at Bon Secours. Directly owns EHR LMS operations - primary operational contact for Epic training LMS integration.

contacts.title: Program Manager, Learning & Digital Adoption
contacts.relevance_notes: Program Manager Learning & Digital Adoption since 2023. MS from Western Carolina University. Previously Program Manager Learning Curriculum and Learning Delivery Specialist. Prior L&D experience at Biltmore and UPM. Owns digital adoption programs - key contact for change management and adoption strategies.

contacts.title: Manager, Training
contacts.relevance_notes: Manager Training at Mercy Health. Owns training programs and delivery. Direct stakeholder for training technology and content decisions.

contacts.title: EPIC Application Coordinator & Team Lead, Manager
contacts.persona_match: EPIC Application Manager - Technical Implementation Lead
contacts.relevance_notes: EPIC Application Coordinator & Team Lead Manager since 2015. BS from University of Cincinnati, PMP certified. 10 years leading EPIC applications at Bon Secours Mercy Health. Prior IT experience at Messer and Schulte Corporation. Key technical contact for EPIC application training coordination.

contacts.title: Manager, Learning Delivery
contacts.relevance_notes: Manager Learning Delivery since May 2025. MA Executive Leadership from Liberty University, BA Business Administration from Southern New Hampshire University. Previously Internal Mobility Partner and Learning Delivery Specialist at BSMH. Also Adjunct Instructor at ECPI University. Owns learning delivery operations.

contact_summary.decision_maker_coverage: Strong - CITO, Chief Clinical Informatics Officer, VP IT Operations (x2), Director Nursing Informatics, Executive Director EPIC Operations, Learning Technology Manager, EHR LMS Supervisor
contact_summary.recommended_entry_point: Susan Armentrout (Chief Clinical Informatics Officer) - owns clinical technology strategy including Dragon Copilot initiatives. Kelley Recker (VP IT Operations) - previously VP EMR Operations & Training with direct Epic training leadership experience.

discovery_notes: Excellent contact coverage across all three target personas. Note: Scott Richert, Tracy Breece (Dragon Copilot lead), and Kendra Salsman (Epic Training Manager) mentioned in research were not found in ZoomInfo - may have left organization, use different names, or have privacy restrictions. Edmund Siy as CITO is the ultimate executive sponsor at parent company (Bon Secours Mercy Health). Susan Armentrout as Chief Clinical Informatics Officer owns clinical technology strategy. Kelley Recker as VP IT Operations is particularly valuable given her prior role as VP EMR Operations & Training from 2016-2020. Laura Seikel directly owns EPIC System Operations. Dane Huxford owns Learning Technology solutions. Olivia Buchanan supervises the EHR LMS. Multiple learning and training managers identified (Rachel VanderJagt, Connie Coker, Katelyn Shannon) provide depth in training program ownership. Strong Epic training infrastructure contacts including James Ruschau as EPIC Application Team Lead. Parent company (Bon Secours Mercy Health) contacts provide enterprise-level decision maker access.
